name: Static (itch) (ihavefivehat)
description:
Defeat enemies quickly to keep up your multiplier and earn a high score. Your gun oscillates back and forth between long and short range.

Originally made for the Global Game Jam 2017. Polished/tuned sporadically over subsequent months. Expect more updates soon.

music:

Running - "Right Lane Leaving"

Alesia Cosmos - "So Far"

Chrome - "You've Been Duplicated"

The Dance - "Do Dada"

Pavement - "Conduit For Sale"

Melt Banana - "Shield Your Eyes, A Beast In The Palm of Your Hands"
